verses.name: Genesis 46:31
verses.text: And Joseph said unto his brethren, and unto his father’s house, I will go up, and shew Pharaoh, and say unto him, My brethren, and my father’s house, which were in the land of Canaan, are come unto me;

verses.name: Genesis 46:32
verses.text: And the men are shepherds, for their trade hath been to feed cattle; and they have brought their flocks, and their herds, and all that they have.

verses.name: Genesis 46:33
verses.text: And it shall come to pass, when Pharaoh shall call you, and shall say, What is your occupation?
